venue.name: Unitarian Congregation of Mendon and Uxbridge

item.description:
“Flyin’ High!”  

 Flyin’ High is an a capella women’s quartet that has been together for seven years. They sing four part harmony in the barbershop style, and their repertoire includes Broadway and standards, as well as popular songs.  Their entertainment ranges from comedy to poignant ballads and it is obvious that they enjoy singing and bringing their brand of fun to others.  Familiar and not so familiar songs interspersed with humor and comedy verging on slapstick make their concerts fun and entertaining.

There is no charge for the concerts, we welcome donations of food for the area food pantries.

 

Meet at the church around 3:45 pm and we will all sit together.  Afterwards (5:15 pm) we'll go out for an early dinner at the fabulous Miss Mendon Diner!
item.why: This will be a fun performance!
item.name: Free Concert - Women's Barbershop Quartet
